response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it an attractive proposition for you. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer, and we'll guide you through the next steps. Should you need any further information or have questions about the product, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
